## Installation

All hail pip!

$ `pip install tgintegration --upgrade`


<details><summary><i>Feeling adventurous?</i></summary><p>

For bleeding edge, install the master branch:

<pre>pip install git+https://github.com/JosXa/tgintegration.git</pre>

</p></details>
